testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open and the URL is entered............................passed When the valid username and password are entered............................passed And the Login button is clicked.............................................passed And the Settings link is clicked, followed by the Serv&Cat tab, then Service.passed Then the Service page text is validated.....................................passed

testcase.name: Add a new service
testcase.system-out: When the Add Service button is clicked......................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the Service Add page..................passed When the user enters all necessary data on the General page.................passed And the Save button is clicked..............................................passed And the user fills in the service availability data on the Availability page.passed And the user enters the price based on the segment..........................passed And the user uploads an image...............................................passed And clicks the Save Changes button..........................................passed And the user uploads a video link...........................................passed And the user either adds the new service or clicks the Cancel button to return to the home page.passed Then the newly added service should be verified.............................passed

testcase.name: Verify Service Edit Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a Service is selected and the Edit button is clicked...................passed And the Service name is modified............................................passed And the Save button is clicked..............................................passed And get back to the Service home page.......................................passed Then the modified Service name is verified..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Service Delete Functionality
testcase.system-out: When a Service is selected and the Delete button is clicked.................passed Then the Service should no longer appear in the list........................passed
